title: All 20 iPod Games - Corrupt Zip Fixed by wzaerreazw.7z
description:
For everyone looking at this, I know you probably found the original IPOD 20 games. Well there&#039;s No-One with 100% complete zip file. Everyone on the torrent is at 99.8% because the initial seeder probably thought it would be funny to leave everyone at 99.8%. It is corrupt and you probably can&#039;t extract it. I fixed the Zip and now here is the result. Believe it or not, the corrupted file in the Zip was Pacman.jpg (lol).

So... you won&#039;t have that, but if you want you can put your own pacman photo in I guess (Under *\Fixed_Zip_Games_RO\Games_RO\AAAAA). I don&#039;t know whether or not that missing file will cause problems in installation and/or gameplay, but whatever, I&#039;m sure since you can use torrent you can fix that if the problem arises... A.K.A. putting a picture into a folder, rofl.

Second, the Ipod firmware was improperly compressed into a zip, so if you did manage to download and extract the zip, it was uninstallable anyway. Ta-da. Well I fixed that too.

Also, it is much more compressed thatn the original, using he much better "7-Zip" Format, so it should download much faster. The Extraction program for this can be found at 7-Zip.org =)

I wanted to play, and a Corrupt Zip wasn&#039;t my idea of a fun time. So I fixed it, and I thought I should share my fix.
